+page.server.ts
ts
import type { PageServerLoad, Actions } from './$types';
let user;


export const load: PageServerLoad = () => {
	return { user };
};


export const actions = {
	default: async ({ request }) => {
		const data = await request.formData();


		// NEVER DO THIS!
		user = {
			name: data.get('name'),
			embarrassingSecret: data.get('secret'),
		};
	},
} satisfies Actions;
